name: Automate Vendor Contract Renewals & Reminders with GPT-4.1 mini, Slack, and Gmail

user.name: Trung Tran
user.bio: Empowering small and medium businesses with smart automation and practical AI, no big tech team required.

description:
# üìù Smart Vendor Contract Renewal & Reminder Workflow With GPT 4.1 mini
### Never miss a vendor renewal again!
This smart workflow automatically tracks expiring contracts, reminds your finance team via Slack, and helps initiate renewal with vendors through email ‚Äî all with built-in approval and logging. Perfect for managing both auto-renew and manual contracts.
## üìå Who‚Äôs it for
This workflow is designed for **Finance and Procurement teams** responsible for managing **vendor/service contracts**. It ensures timely notifications for expiring contracts and automates the initiation of renewal conversations with vendors.

## ‚öôÔ∏è How it works / What it does

1. **‚è∞ Daily Trigger**
   - Runs every day at 6:00 AM using a scheduler.

2. **üìÑ Retrieve Contract List**
   - Reads vendor contract data from a **Google Sheet** (or any data source).
   - Filters for contracts nearing their **end date**, using a **Notice Period (days)** field.

3. **üîÄ Branch Based on Renewal Type**
   - **Auto-Renew Contracts**:
     - Compose a Slack message summarizing the auto-renewal.
     - Notify the finance contact via Slack.

   - **Manual Renewal Contracts**:
     - Use an OpenAI-powered agent to generate a meaningful Slack message.
     - Send message and **wait for approval** from the finance contact (e.g., within 8 hours).
     - Upon approval, generate a formal **HTML email** to the vendor.
     - Send the email to **initiate the contract extension process**.

4. **üìä (Optional) Logging**
   - Can be extended to **log all actions** (Slack messages, emails, approvals) to **Google Sheets** or other databases.

## üõ†Ô∏è How to set up

1. **Prepare your Google Sheet**
   - Include the following fields:
     - `Vendor Name`, `Vendor Email`, `Service Type`, `Contract Start Date`, `Contract End Date`, `Notice Period (days)`, `Renewal Type`, `Finance Contact`, `Contact Email`, `Slack ID`, `Contract Value`, `Notes`.
     - Sample: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1zdDgKyL0sY54By57Yz4dNokQC_oIbVxcCKeWJ6PADBM/edit?usp=sharing

2. **Configure Integrations**
   - üü¢ **Google Sheets API**: To read contract data.
   - üîµ **Slack API**: To notify and wait for approval.
   - üß† **OpenAI API (GPT-4)**: To generate personalized reminders.
   - ‚úâÔ∏è **Email (SMTP/Gmail)**: To send emails to vendors.

3. **Set the Daily Scheduler**
   - Use a Cron node to trigger the workflow at `6:00 AM` daily.

## ‚úÖ Requirements

| Component                        | Required |
|----------------------------------|----------|
| Google Sheets API                | ‚úÖ       |
| Slack API                        | ‚úÖ       |
| OpenAI API (GPT-4)               | ‚úÖ       |
| Email (SMTP/Gmail)               | ‚úÖ       |
| n8n (Self-hosted or Cloud)       | ‚úÖ       |
| Contract Sheet with proper schema| ‚úÖ       |

## üß© How to customize the workflow
- **Adjust Reminder Period**: Modify the logic in the `Find Expiring Vendors` node (based on `Contract End Date` and `Notice Period`).
- **Change Message Tone or Format**: Customize the OpenAI agent's prompt or switch from plain text to branded HTML email.
- **Add Logging or Tracking**: Add a node to append logs to a **Google Sheet**, **Notion**, or **database**.
- **Replace Data Source**: Swap out Google Sheets for **Airtable**, **PostgreSQL**, or **other CRM/database systems**.
- **Adjust Wait/Approval Duration**: Modify the `sendAndWait` Slack node timeout (e.g., from 8 hours to 2 hours).

## üì¶ Optional Extensions
- üßæ Add PDF contract preview via Drive link
- üß† Use GPT to summarize renewal terms
- üõ† Auto-create Jira task for contract review

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

data.details: The Code node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow.

nodes.name: Remind Finance Contact & Waiting For Approval

messageValues.message:
You are a helpful assistant that drafts professional email reminders to finance contacts about upcoming or overdue vendor contract renewals.

## Instructions:
- Use a clear, polite, and informative tone.
- The email should include:
  - Vendor name and service type
  - Contract end date
  - Renewal type (Manual or Auto-Renew)
  - Days left until expiration (or if overdue)
  - Contract value (if available)
  - Notes field (if provided)
- Address the finance contact by name.
- Mention next steps if renewal is manual.
- Keep the email concise but informative.

## Output format:
- `subject`: A short subject line for the email
- `body`: The full email body (plain text or simple HTML)

Now write the subject and body.

parameters.content:
## 2. Get vendor contract list & find expiring contract
- Get vendor contract list from database (Google Sheet)
- Filter out expiring contract based on end date & notice date

## 3.1 Notify finance team about auto-renew contract
- Send message via Slack to finance team so that they're aware of upcoming auto-renew contract

## 3.2 Send manual contract extension notice to finance team
- Vendor reminder agent compose meaningful message to finance team about upcoming manual renewal
- Message send over Slack and waiting for approval (max 8hrs, configurable)

## 4. Send email to vendor to initiate the contract extend process
- Code node compose HTML message 
- Mail node send email to vendor to init contract extension process

main.node: Remind Finance Contact & Waiting For Approval
